thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice old world feel
thread.title_full: Nice old world feel - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GastroGaz
title: Nice old world feel
text: Only one night here as heading home. Very friendly staff all around. The room was of moderate size. The bed was very comfortable. One only minor disappointment, the night we arrived the shower was only luke warm, but was hot the next morning. Reasonably close to Metro and walking distance to a great discount department store: Century 21.
